title: Judge HR rescues Yanks as 'ghosts' keep ball fair
content: Aaron Judge hit a tying homer and drove in four runs during a clutch performance for the ages as the Yankees rallied to beat Toronto in Game 3.

title: Sources: Cards fining Gannon $100K for RB spat
content: The Cardinals are fining coach Jonathan Gannon $100,000 for his sideline altercation Sunday with running back Emari Demercado, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

title: M's show off 'complete team,' now on cusp of ALCS
content: The Mariners got contributions from nearly every player and in every phase of the game Tuesday night to beat the Tigers 8-4 in Game 3, putting them one win from the ALCS.

title: Sullivan's debut as Rangers coach spoiled by Pens
content: Mike Sullivan, a former New York assistant hired to be the next Rangers head coach in the offseason, made his debut Tuesday night at Madison Square Garden, but his former team, the Pittsburgh Penguins, stole the show and skated off with a 3-0 victory.

title: OBJ accepts 6-game PED suspension from NFL
content: Odell Beckham Jr. has accepted a six-game suspension for violating the NFL's policy on performance-enhancing drugs.

title: Ravens shake up D, trade Oweh for Bolts' Gilman
content: The Ravens traded slumping pass rusher Odafe Oweh and a 2027 seventh-round pick to the Chargers on Tuesday in exchange for safety Alohi Gilman and a fifth-round pick in 2026, the teams announced.

title: Police: Lacy's driving set off events in fatal crash
content: Louisiana State Police released video and records related to a fatal crash in December 2024 they allege was caused by ex-LSU football player Kyren Lacy.

title: Panthers lift banner, open 'new chapter' with win
content: Moments before opening the regular season with a 3-2 victory over the Chicago Blackhawks, the Florida Panthers, in commemoration of their latest title, watched the Stanley Cup championship banner get raised to the rafters on Tuesday at Amerant Bank Arena.

title: 🤔 Lakers not fazed by LeBron's 'Second Decision'
content: The Los Angeles Lakers weren't worried about LeBron James retiring after his Monday "The Second Decision" post.

title: Is Sid wasting his final chapter in Pittsburgh? What Malkin, Letang and Crosby think
content: Still one of the best players in the NHL,  could Crosby's future lie somewhere other than Pittsburgh?

title: Our early hot takes from the 2025 MLB playoffs
content: What can we learn from a week of MLB postseason baseball? Enough to make our experts go all-in on their boldest predictions.

title: NFL Power Rankings: Big jumps for the Colts and 49ers? How far did the Chargers fall?
content: We stacked every NFL team ahead of Week 6. Which teams rose into or fell out of the top 10? Plus, we have fantasy surprises on each roster.

content: We're grading deals before the trade deadline, including the Bengals' pickup of Joe Flacco and the Harbaugh deal.

title: CFP Bubble Watch: Who's in, who's out, who has work to do in each league﻿
content: Putting the spotlight on select teams and questions around others as the early playoff picture takes shape.

title: 'Beyond repair': Napheesa Collier, Cathy Engelbert and a WNBA teetering on the brink
content: Amid the WNBA Finals, two of the most powerful people in the game are locked in a contentious battle -- for public opinion, power and money.

title: Giannis Antetokounmpo has finally put the Milwaukee Bucks on the clock
content: In a transformative summer for the Bucks, the team had discussions about moving the two-time MVP to New York.

title: Beaten in the final last season, Barça begin UWCL with a bang
content: Barcelona played like they had something to prove in their 7-1 rout of Bayern Munich on Tuesday, sending out an ominous warning to their UWCL title rivals

title: Arsenal orchestrate their own demise in loss to Lyonnes
content: Reigning Champions League winners Arsenal opened the new season with a loss to French powerhouse Lyon.

title: How the John Elway-led Broncos of the mid-2010s grew an NFL general manager tree
content: The Broncos turned into a GM factory under Elway, as four current and two former GMs were in Denver under his Super Bowl-winning regime.

title: Men's Preseason Top 25: Who is No. 1? Plus risers and fallers in final month to tip
content: Does Purdue, Houston or Florida deserve the top spot? Find out in the last offseason edition of our rankings.

title: Women's college basketball Preseason Top 25 for 2025-26
content: The reigning champ and runner-up are 1-2. Who rounds out the rest, and which transfer should you watch?

title: Is it time to worry about Mohamed Salah at Liverpool?
content: There is a lot of uncertainty around this new-look Liverpool side right now, but one thing we know for sure: if Salah doesn't play like himself soon, nothing else matters.

title: Portland peaking, KC's unbeaten run hits 16
content: Kansas City is out of sight at the top of ESPN's NWSL Power Rankings, but behind the Current, Portland is rounding into form at just the right time.

title: The 49ers are finding ways to win -- thanks to (receiver?) Christian McCaffrey
content: While the 49ers have not been productive on the ground, their running back has been producing through the air.

title: Fantasy football rest-of-season rankings: Smith-Njigba and Egbuka enter top 10
content: Eric Karabell updates his fantasy rankings at every position for the remainder of the season, including his overall top 100.

title: Fred VanVleet injury: Four things to know about its impact on Rockets, Durant
content: Our NBA insiders broke down the injury's impact on the team, its players and what Houston could do to bolster its lineup.

title: Miami dominance and a UCLA stunner: Recapping a chaotic Week 6
content: In Week 6, the Grim Reaper came for Penn State and Texas, but Miami proved itself against Florida State.

title: Should you bet on Miami QB Carson Beck for the Heisman?
content: As the odds shift for the Heisman Trophy and national championship, Pamela Maldonado explains how to bet them heading into Week 7.

title: Five position battles to watch during NBA preseason
content: With the NBA preseason under way, Eric Moody highlights the key position battles that fantasy managers need to watch closely.

title: Draft guide: All you need to win your league this season
content: We've got everything you need to help you prepare for and execute a successful draft, all in one place.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Bayern looking to win race for Guéhi
content: Bayern Munich will reportedly look to sign Crystal Palace defender Marc Guéhi. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: TGL Season 2 schedule: How to watch matches on ESPN networks
content: The tech-infused golf league, fronted by Tiger Woods and Rory McIlroy, plays its matches at SoFi Center in Palm Beach Gardens, Florida.

title: Zubeen Garg's Cop Cousin Arrested. He Was At Singapore Yacht Party
content: Zubeen Garg's cousin, who had travelled with him to Singapore, has been arrested by the Assam Police's Special Investigation Team (SIT) amid a probe into the singer's mysterious drowning death.

title: Thane Man Gets Rs 51 Lakh Compensation 11 Years After Wife's Death In Accident
content: The Motor Accident Claims Tribunal (MACT) in Thane here has awarded a compensation of Rs 51.73 lakh to a man for the death of his wife in a road accident in 2014.

title: Festive Fun Or Wallet Burn? Company Asks Employees To Pay For Diwali Bash
content: The employees at an Indian firm were in for a festive surprise until they received a WhatsApp message that ruined the vibe.

title: Bhojpuri Actor-Politician Pawan Singh Gets Y+ Security Ahead Of Bihar Polls
content: Bhojpuri actor and singer Pawan Singh has been provided Y+ category months ahead of the Bihar assembly elections, sources said.

title: 93rd Indian Air Force Day Celebrated At Hindon Airbase, Spotlight On Op Sindoor
content: The 93rd Indian Air Force Day was celebrated at the Hindon Air Force Station on Wednesday, honouring the valour and dedication of the men and women in blue who safeguard the nation's skies.

title: Telangana Minister's "Regret" Note After Buffalo Remark Against Colleague
content: Telangana's Backward Classes Welfare Minister Ponnam Prabhakar has expressed regret over the row over his remarks on cabinet colleague, Scheduled Caste Welfare Minister Adluri Laxman Kumar.

title: Video: West Bengal Doctor Ziplines To Treat Landslide-Affected Patients
content: A doctor was seen swinging by a rope over a gorge to reach patients stranded in an area cut off by landslides in West Bengal.

title: India Sides With Taliban, Pakistan, China, Russia Against Trump's Bagram Airbase Bid
content: India joined Russia, China and seven other nations to oppose efforts to deploy foreign military infrastructure in Afghanistan, against the backdrop of US President Donald Trump's calls to the Taliban regime to hand over the Bagram airbase.

title: Meeting With PM Modi, Trip To Film Studio: A Look At UK PM Keir Starmer's India Agenda
content: United Kingdom Prime Minister Keir Starmer arrived in Mumbai on Wednesday for a two-day visit, months after New Delhi and London signed the landmark free trade agreement (FTA) after years of intense negotiations.

title: Johnson & Johnson To Pay $966 Million In Baby Powder Cancer Case
content: Johnson & Johnson was told by a California jury to pay $966 million to the family of a dead woman who blamed her cancer on life-long use of the company's baby powder in the largest verdict for a single user in the 15-year litigation.

title: Tesla Cars Now Start At Under $40,000 To Counter Loss Of US EV Incentives
content: Tesla Inc. introduced new versions of its top-selling models priced at under $40,000, making its main vehicles more affordable to counteract the loss of US incentives for electric cars.

title: Nvidia To Finance Elon Musk's xAI Chips As Part Of $20 Billion Deal
content: Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup xAI is raising more financing than initially planned, tapping backers including Nvidia Corp. to lift its ongoing funding round to $20 billion, according to people with knowledge of the matter.

title: Google AI Mode Rolls Out In 7 New Indian Languages
content: Google on Wednesday announced a major update for its AI-powered Search experience in India, expanding AI Mode to seven new Indian languages -- Bengali, Kannada, Malayalam, Marathi, Tamil, Telugu, and Urdu.

title: Exclusive: Coldrif Cough Syrup Contains Salt Banned 2 Years Ago For Children Under 4
content: Prescribed in children to treat symptoms of cold and cough, including runny nose, sneezing and sore throat and watery eyes, Coldrif contains Chlorpheniramine Maleate, Paracetamol and Phenylephrine.

title: Dulquer Salmaan, Film Stars' Houses Raided Again In Luxury Car Smuggling Case
content: Malayalam superstar Dulquer Salmaan's house and over a dozen locations across South India were raided by the Enforcement Directorate amid a probe into smuggling cartels illegally importing high-end luxury vehicles from Bhutan, sources said.

title: Trump Warns, 'We Have An Insurrection Act For A Reason.' What It Means
content: US President Donald Trump on Monday said he might use the Insurrection Act, a law authorising the president to deploy military forces on US soil, if courts  continue to block his deployment of National Guard troops in Democratic-led cities

title: Opinion: Opinion | To Just Welcome The 'Immigrant' Is Not The Point - By Shashi Tharoor
content: Nations have the right to regulate entry, to balance openness with cohesion. But the tone of the current moment suggests something more corrosive - a retreat not just from policy generosity, but from moral imagination.

title: Google Is Offering Up To Rs 26 Lakh For Finding Bugs In Its AI Systems
content: Google is offering researchers up to $30,000 (Rs 26.6 lakh) to find and report security flaws in its AI systems.

title: "Symbol Of Social Justice": PM Modi On Ram Vilas Paswan's Death Anniversary
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi paid tributes to former Union Minister Ram Vilas Paswan on his death anniversary on Wednesday and recalled his contributions to public service and nation-building.

title: Video: Locals Film Truck Accident, Run For Their Lives As Cylinders Explode
content: Moments before a deadly collision on the Jaipur-Ajmer Highway near Mozamabad in Dudu, people in a nearby hotel were seen recording the scene on their mobile phones. Seconds later, people were running for their lives

title: Opportunities waiting to be seized under India-U.K. FTA unparalleled: Keir Starmer
content: Keir Starmer said the trade deal is a "launchpad" to expand bilateral trade and economic growth with India

title: Nagamalai hillock in Erode district notified as Tamil Nadu’s fourth Biodiversity Heritage Site
content: The State government has already declared Arittapatti in Madurai district, Kasampatty in Dindigul district, and Elathur lake in Erode district as Biodiversity Heritage Sites

title: Assam Police DSP arrested in connection with singer Zubeen Garg's death
content: We have arrested Sandipan Garg. Now, we are doing the necessary legal formalities, says CID Special DGP Munna Prasad Gupta

title: Bilaspur landslip: Death toll rises to 16 as rescue teams push through debris of buried bus
content: Rescue operations, which were halted late last night due to poor visibility and mud sliding, resumed on Wednesday morning

title: Custodial death: SC seeks explanation from CBI, M.P. government over delay in arresting policemen
content: What happened all these days? Why couldn't you trace them? We have to almost frame contempt charges for you to act. This is not how Supreme Court order should be applied. There was a three-judge bench order to arrest, the Bench observed

title: Congress announces political affairs committee for Mumbai region
content: The Congress also appointed 6 district presidents, one senior spokesperson, five spokespersons and one social media coordinator for Mumbai

title: Veteran RSS leader and former MLC K. Narahari passes away in Bengaluru
content: A dyed-in-the-wool RSS member, Narahari caught the attention of senior leaders when he worked effectively in building RSS Shakhas in Kodagu district in 1959-60 as the Sangh Pracharak.

title: All 16 CPI(M) workers in New Mahe double murder case acquitted
content: Two of the accused died during trial, while the remaining 14 were found not guilty as prosecution failed to prove charges

title: Air Force Day 2025: Operation Sindoor showcased power of air attacks, says IAF chief
content: Air Chief Marshal Singh noted that the increasing pace of integration of new systems, weapons and equipment into the IAF’s operational plans has been a “significant success”

title: Actor Vijay’s TVK moves Supreme Court seeking independent probe into Karur stampede
content: The plea has challenged the Madras High Court’s October 3 order constituting a SIT headed by Inspector-General of Police Asra Garg to conduct a probe into the incident

title: Massive blaze on Jaipur-Ajmer highway as over 40 gas cylinders explode after road crash
content: A total of 120 cylinders were safe. All of them were removed by the team of Hindustan Petroleum that followed all safety measures and protocols to sanitise the area, says Jaipur Collector Dr Jitendra Soni

title: Uproar in Kerala Assembly as Opposition attempts to storm Speaker’s podium over Sabarimala ‘gold-plating row’
content: Though the attempt was thwarted by guards, it led to unruly scenes, with legislators from Treasury Bench entering the well of the House and locking horns with Opposition members

title: ED conducts raids in Mumbai in drug trafficking case
content: The action has been undertaken to trace the sale proceeds acquired by a "well-established" drug trafficking network involving Faisal Javed Shaikh and Alfiya Faisal Shaikh

title: Four more arrested for lynching Dalit man in Raebareli, face Gangsters Act, NSA
content: Hariom Valmiki was reportedly lynched by villagers who mistook him for a thief during a night vigil at about 1 a.m. on October 2; the official said total of nine arrests were made relating to the case

title: Security beefed up in Jharkhand as banned Maoists' outfit calls for ‘resistance week’, bandh
content: Police sources said that continuous combing and search operations and recent success in the form of elimination and surrenders of wanted Maoists have pushed left-wing extremists (LWE) to the brink

title: Kerala youth dies after collapsing on train, family alleges Railways negligence over ambulance delay
content: Chalakudy native Sreejith lay on the platform for half an hour without medical help after collapsing aboard the Mumbai–Ernakulam Okha Express

title: Indians lead drop in U.S. university visas
content: India, which last year was the top source of foreign students to the United States, saw the most dramatic drop with 44.5% fewer student visas issued in August 2025 than a year earlier

title: PM Modi to meet U.K. PM Starmer in Mumbai, to inaugurate infrastructure projects
content: PM Modi’s schedule includes a walkthrough of the newly built Navi Mumbai International Airport and launching several other projects in Mumbai

title: Sergio Gor confirmed as U.S. Ambassador to India
content: At his confirmation hearing in the Senate Foreign Relations Committee last month, Mr. Gor had said that India is a strategic partner whose trajectory will shape the region and beyond.

title: ED raids premises of actors Dulquer Salmaan, Prithviraj Sukumaran in luxury car smuggling probe
content: The raids were conducted at 17 locations across Kerala and Tamil Nadu as part of an investigation into the alleged smuggling of high-end pre-owned luxury vehicles and unauthorised foreign exchange transactions

title: Anthropic to open first India office next year
content: The new office would be located in Bengaluru, widely recognised as a technology hub of India, and would begin operations early 2026, the company said

title: Bihar Assembly election LIVE updates: More than 14,000 centenarians likely to cast votes this time in Bihar
content: According to ECI data, the number of female voters reduced from 3.72 crore on January 1 to 3.49 crore after the SIR; The count for male voters fell from 4.07 crore to 3.92 crore

title: Crimes against children surge in Assam, Rajasthan, and Kerala: NCRB data
content: A rise in the number of cases does not always mean a rise in the number of crimes; it may also indicate better reporting

title: Searching for George in Chennai’s George Town
content: George Town in Chennai is, sadly, a perfect instance of how not to maintain a truly heritage precinct

title: Hyderabad motorists using phones while driving to face ₹1,000 fine in special enforcement drive
content: Hyderabad traffic police have issued 77,791 challans for mobile phone use while driving; slapped ₹7.72 crore in fine this year so far

title: Starmer arrives in India with large business delegation in tow
content: Ministers, CEOs and representatives from British universities and industry groups seek to bolster ties; bilateral trade in goods and services for the year ending March 31 was valued at £44.1 billion

title: The tale of Partition Committee that discussed bifurcation of Andhra State from Madras Presidency in 1949
content: The panel’s work remains less known. Had the committee succeeded in its mission, the history of south India would have been different.

title: When violence broke out after Vanniyar Sangam’s Chitra Pournami festival in 2013, Jayalalithaa blamed High Court for permitting rallies
content: Jayalalithaa said public property worth crores of rupees had been destroyed in the violence unleashed by the PMK men

title: BJP has finished Nitish Kumar physically and mentally: Pappu Yadav
content: Rajesh Ranjan alias Pappu Yadav, six-times Bihar MP is currently an Independent MP from Purnea in Seemanchal (border) area. Having a bahubali (strongman) image, he also does lot of charity donating money to the needy people. Though it is an Assembly election in Bihar, he has been in the limelight for many reasons. Recently Mr. Yadav was seen sharing dais with Prime Minister Narendra Modi and was also caught on camera when he was not allowed to share the open vehicle in which Rahul Gandhi and Tejashwi Yadav were moving in Patna. The Hindu caught him at his residence in Patna in which he spoke on several issues including giving advice to Tejashwi Yadav and Chirag Paswan to destroy the arrogance. He also asserted that he does not mind even though he was humiliated. Excerpts.

title: NDA will win Ghatshila by-poll, claims Babulal Marandi
content: The ECI on Monday announced by polls for eight Assembly constituencies across seven States and Union Territories scheduled for November 11, with results to be declared on November 14 including Jharkhand’s Ghatshila

title: J&K L-G gets angry at drop of hat, thinned my security cover for raising serious questions: Deputy Chief Minister Surinder Choudhary
content: He also claimed whenever he spoke truth about the previous regime in J&K, the L-G administration “goes after relatives”

title: Patients shifted to old emergency wing after fire in Jaipur hospital
content: Only 22 ICU beds, including six in the emergency ward and 16 in the polytrauma ward, were available for the patients needing critical care after the fire incident

title: Activist seeks AG's nod to initiate contempt proceedings over remarks on CJI Gavai
content: A 71-year-old lawyer attempted to hurl a shoe at CJI Gavai in his courtroom in the Supreme Court on Monday

title: Sameer Wankhede vs Aryan Khan: Delhi HC issues notice against Red Chillies, Netflix
content: The Delhi High Court has summoned Red Chillies Entertainment, Netflix, and others in response to a defamation suit filed by former NCB officer Sameer Wankhede. Wankhede claims the Netflix series 'The Ba**ds of Bollywood' maligned his reputation and undermined public confidence in law enforcement. The court has directed respondents to file replies within seven days.

title: 11 Pak paramilitary troops killed in ambush near Afghan border; TTP claims responsibility
content: Eleven Pakistani paramilitary personnel, including two officers, were killed in an ambush by Islamist militants near the Afghan border. The attack occurred while the troops were operating in a volatile region known for frequent militant assaults. Security forces have initiated a search operation for the perpetrators.

title: Shoe hurling gesture at CJI: Lawyers protest demanding punishment
content: Lawyers across India protested against advocate Rakesh Kishore for allegedly attempting to hurl an object at Chief Justice of India BR Gavai in the Supreme Court. The advocate fraternity condemned the act as an attack on the judiciary and the Constitution, demanding stern action and threatening court boycotts.

title: How Shreyas Iyer won his place back in Indian team and 'stamped authority'
content: Shreyas Iyer shared his journey back to international cricket. After losing his central contract, he excelled in domestic tournaments and the Champions Trophy. Iyer focused on his game and proved critics wrong about his technique. He is now in strong form and preparing for the upcoming series against Australia.

title: Zoho founder: Whether it is Google or Apple, when they operate in India, they have to….
content: Zoho founder Sridhar Vembu outlined his company's three-tiered approach to user privacy on X. He detailed protections for "secret lover" data, a pledge against using customer data for advertising, and the limits of corporate responsibility in "secret rebel" cases, emphasizing adherence to national laws.

title: Ukraine claims capturing Indian national fighting for Russian army
content: Ukrainian forces have reportedly captured a 22-year-old Indian national fighting for the Russian army. Indian authorities are verifying the reports. The man, identified as Majoti Sahil Mohammed from Gujarat, allegedly joined the Russian military after a drug conviction. He claims he did not want to fight and surrendered. He was reportedly promised freedom and payment but received none.

title: Tax trouble! Infosys issued Rs 415 cr showcase notice by DGGI; what the matter is about
content: The DGGI has issued a notice to Infosys for allegedly claiming ₹414.88 crore in improper ITC refunds for services exported between 2018-19 and 2023-24. The investigation suggests the IT giant included services from foreign branches and subcontractors in its zero-rated export turnover, leading to excessive refund claims.

title: Brazilian influencer dies at 31: Succumbs to severe complications from cosmetic surgery
content: Brazilian social media star Junior Dutra has died at 31. He suffered severe complications after a popular cosmetic procedure known as 'fox eyes' surgery. The influencer had shared his struggles with infection and deteriorating health. His death highlights the risks associated with trendy beauty enhancements. Investigations are underway regarding the practitioner's qualifications.

title: Punjabi singer Rajvir Jawanda passes away after a road accident
content: Punjabi singer Rajvir Jawanda has passed away on October 8 following a road accident that occurred on September 27. He was admitted to Fortis Hospital, Mohali, and was on life support for spinal and head injuries sustained after his car collided with stray cattle. Jawanda was known for hit songs like 'Kangni' and films such as 'Jind Jaan'.

title: Nvidia CEO: Company to keep sponsoring H-1B visas despite Trump’s fee hike
content: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang assured employees the company will cover the new $100,000 H-1B visa fee, aiming to ease concerns after President Trump's executive order. Huang emphasized immigration's crucial role in US technological leadership, stating the fee could help reshape policy and eliminate illegal immigration.

title: 'Stop trolling the kid': Ex-cricketer defends Harshit Rana
content: Former India opener Aakash Chopra defended young pacer Harshit Rana against online backlash for his repeated selection in Indian squads. Chopra urged fans to direct criticism at selectors, not the player, emphasising Rana's potential and the team management's faith in him. He called for patience and perspective, reminding fans that Rana is a young cricketer pursuing his dream.

title: Jeff Bezoz's career advice to young people: 'Go work at McDonald’s'
content: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos advises young aspiring entrepreneurs to gain foundational experience by working at McDonald's. He emphasizes that such roles teach crucial skills like responsibility, discipline, and customer interaction, which are vital for long-term success and often overlooked by Gen Z in their pursuit of rapid startup growth.

title: Watch: Trying to take selfie, man falls 200 metres from mountain in China; dies
content: A tourist, identified as Hong, died on Mount Nama in Sichuan after unbuckling his safety harness to take a selfie. The 31-year-old slipped near a crevasse and fell 200 meters down the snowy peak. Officials stated the group had not obtained climbing permits, and the incident is under police investigation.

title: Who was GN Ramachandran? Scientist who made 3 world-changing discoveries
content: Today marks the birth anniversary of G.N. Ramachandran, a brilliant Indian scientist whose work revolutionized protein structure and medical imaging. His groundbreaking collagen model and the Ramachandran plot are vital tools in biology and medicine. Despite his immense contributions, he remained largely unrecognized in India, a testament to his enduring, yet underappreciated, genius.

title: 'Bold & precise attacks': IAF chief reflects on Op Sindoor; hails home-grown capabilities
content: Air Marshal AP Singh lauded the Indian Air Force's decisive response in Operation Sindoor, a swift counter-terror action against Pakistan-backed attacks. He emphasized how meticulous planning and indigenous weapons delivered precise blows, restoring offensive air power's prominence. The operation successfully targeted terrorist hubs and thwarted Pakistani retaliation, showcasing India's potent aerial capabilities.

title: Time running out for Sai Sudharsan? Not much room for failure in Indian cricket
content: Sai Sudharsan faces immense pressure to perform at No. 3 in Tests, with his current average of 21 in seven innings not assuring selectors.  Following the footsteps of Sarfaraz Khan and Karun Nair, who faced repercussions for failures, Sai needs significant runs in the upcoming Kotla Test to secure his position ahead of Dhruv Jurel.

title: Cough syrup row: Fathers in MP battle to prove ‘killer syrup’ claimed their kids
content: Two fathers in Madhya Pradesh are seeking justice after their young sons died, suspecting the cough syrup Coldrif, linked to 17 other deaths, may have been the cause. Despite their efforts to prove the connection, their children's names are not yet officially included in the ongoing investigation.

title: Johnnie Walker, Glenfiddich to get cheaper? India-UK trade deal to put Scotch whisky in focus
content: UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer's Mumbai visit highlights the Scotch whisky industry's potential gains from the India-UK Free Trade Agreement. This deal, expected to boost the Scottish economy significantly, slashes tariffs on whisky, with producers aiming for a billion-pound annual sales increase and over a thousand new jobs.  The agreement also aims to boost overall bilateral trade.

title: 'Demonises Muslims': SC to examine if BJP video attracts hate speech FIR
content: The Supreme Court has agreed to examine a plea seeking an FIR against Assam BJP for a video alleging Muslims would take over the state. Petitioners argue the video vilifies Muslims and violates the apex court's order against hate speech. The court issued notice and will hear the case on October 28.

title: 'We set out to do ...': Rohit's first comment after losing captaincy
content: Rohit Sharma reflected on India's journey from the 2023 ODI World Cup final heartbreak to winning the 2024 T20 World Cup and 2025 Champions Trophy. He credited former coach Rahul Dravid and the team's collective belief for instilling a winning mindset and consistency that led to their ICC title triumphs.

title: Gold price prediction today: Will prices continue to rise ahead of Diwali?
content: Gold price prediction today: Gold prices are poised for further gains ahead of Diwali, driven by investor demand for safe-haven assets amid US economic uncertainty and expectations of Fed rate cuts. India's robust gold imports, defying record prices, are bolstering the precious metal's rally, with strong retail demand anticipated during the festive season.

title: Luxury vehicles smuggling case: ED raids 17 sites in Kerala and Tamil Nadu
content: The Enforcement Directorate conducted searches across Kerala and Tamil Nadu on October 8, 2025, targeting a syndicate involved in smuggling high-end luxury vehicles and unauthorized foreign exchange dealings. Investigations revealed the use of forged documents for fraudulent vehicle registrations, with properties of prominent film personalities among those searched.

title: 'Egoistical losers': Ex-England star lambasts failed generation; slams culture
content: Steven Gerrard revealed that ego and club rivalries prevented England's "golden generation" from achieving international success. He stated that the talented squad, comprised of players from top Premier League clubs, never truly connected as a team. Gerrard believes this lack of unity, rather than a lack of talent, was the primary reason for their underperformance in major tournaments.

title: Mammootty’s property raided by ED: Chennai operation unfolds - Reports
content: Amidst swirling rumors, the Enforcement Directorate took bold action by raiding Mammootty's luxurious property in Chennai as part of an extensive inquiry into suspected luxury vehicle smuggling and tax fraud. This meticulously planned operation, supported by the CRPF, spanned multiple sites across Kerala and Tamil Nadu.

title: Canada PM Mark Carney praises Trump for India - Pakistan ceasefire
content: Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney lauded US President Donald Trump as transformative. Carney cited economic progress and Nato defense increases. He also suggested Trump eased India-Pakistan tensions. India however rejects this, stating the ceasefire followed direct military talks. The conflict began after a terror attack in Jammu and Kashmir. India launched Operation Sindoor in response.

title: Himachal tragedy: 18 dead as landslide strikes bus in Bilaspur; many missing
content: A devastating landslide in Himachal Pradesh's Bilaspur district crushed a private bus, killing at least 18 passengers and leaving many missing. Local residents bravely initiated rescue efforts before authorities arrived, with four survivors, including three children, pulled from the debris. Heavy rainfall is believed to have triggered the tragic incident.

title: Exclusive: Dhruv Jurel's rise - Batting temperament of Dravid & safe hands like Saha
content: Dhruv Jurel’s rise from Agra to the Indian Test team is built on unrelenting work ethic, meticulous training, and remarkable temperament. Mentored by Vikram Rathour and coaches at the Rajasthan Royals' academy, the wicketkeeper-batter has impressed with Wriddhiman Saha-like glovework and Rahul Dravid-like patience.

title: Bengaluru professor arrested for sexually harassing 19-year-old student at his home
content: A 45-year-old professor was arrested for allegedly sexually harassing a 19-year-old student at his Jayanagar residence. The student reported that the professor invited her for lunch under false pretenses, then made inappropriate advances and offered academic favors. He was released on station bail.

title: Eiffel Tower was almost demolished! Here’s how it was saved and survived over a century
content: Initially criticized as monstrous and useless, the Eiffel Tower's survival was secured by its creator, Gustave Eiffel. He transformed the structure into a hub for scientific research and radio transmissions, proving its practical value. These vital scientific uses led to a 70-year permit extension, saving the iconic landmark from demolition.

title: Navi Mumbai: India's largest Greenfield airport project built at Rs 19,650 crore
content: Navi Mumbai International Airport (NMIA) is set to launch in December, aiming for an ambitious start with 50-60 flights daily. This new airport will significantly ease Mumbai's air traffic congestion, handling 20 million passengers annually in its first phase. NMIA also boasts India's largest MRO facilities and aims to be a major cargo hub, enhancing regional connectivity.

title: Why is Zach Bryan facing backlash from MAGA supporters for his song?
content: US music star Zach Bryan is facing backlash from fans and MAGA supporters after posting a song snippet criticizing Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE). The lyrics, from his unreleased song "Bad News," denounce immigration raids and police actions. The White House issued a pointed response, referencing Bryan's songs and defending ICE.

title: Bihar SIR: Supreme Court asks EC to give details of 3.7 lakh excluded voters
content: The Supreme Court questioned an NGO's claims of voter list deletions in Bihar, with the Election Commission stating all parties are satisfied and no appeals were filed. Justices urged the NGO to present affidavits from individuals alleging wrongful removal, highlighting the lack of direct complaints despite a significant number of exclusions.

title: UK PM Keir Starmer lands in Mumbai for two-day India visit
content: UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer has arrived in Mumbai for his inaugural visit to India as PM. He is scheduled to meet with Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Thursday to discuss strengthening the India-UK Comprehensive Strategic Partnership, including trade, technology, and climate initiatives.

title: Heavy rain disrupts air travel in Delhi: 15 flights diverted, 100+ delayed
content: Delhi experienced light to moderate rainfall on Tuesday due to an active western disturbance, causing flight disruptions with 15 diversions and over 100 delays. The city recorded significant rainfall, improving air quality to the satisfactory category. Temperatures are expected to rise from Wednesday as rain subsides.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens flat; BSE Sensex below 82,000 mark
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened in green on Wednesday. While Nifty50 was above 25,100, BSE Sensex was near the 82,00 mark.

title: Gold prices reach record high! Yellow metal surpasses $4,000 levels — Here's why
content: Gold prices have surged to an unprecedented $4,000 per ounce, driven by global economic and political instability. Investors are flocking to the precious metal as a safe haven amid wars and a weakening dollar. Central banks and ETFs are leading the demand, though rising prices are impacting jewelry purchases. This rally occurs alongside record highs in Bitcoin and stock markets.

title: Top stocks to buy: Recommendations for today - check list
content: Stock market recommendations: Anand Rathi's Mehul Kothari recommends Schaeffler India, SPIC, and Datamatics for potential gains. Schaeffler India shows a range breakout with momentum, SPIC signals a trend reversal after a correction, and Datamatics is forming a double bottom with Ichimoku support, suggesting an upside.

title: Brittany Mahomes turns heads as Randi Mahomes proudly cheers her on
content: Brittany Mahomes has launched a stylish new NFL apparel line with Abercrombie & Fitch, showcasing custom Kansas City Chiefs outfits. The collaboration, shot at Arrowhead Stadium, highlights her entrepreneurial spirit and family pride, earning praise from fans and mother-in-law Randi Mahomes. This venture comes as the Chiefs navigate a challenging season, with Brittany encouraging fans to support the team.

title: ‘Hopeful’: Trump meets family of hostage, slain IDF soldier; vows their return
content: President Trump met with released hostage Edan Alexander and the family of slain IDF member Omer Neutra, reiterating his commitment to securing all hostages' release. This meeting occurred as indirect talks in Egypt, involving US officials like Jared Kushner, progressed positively on a prisoner exchange and ceasefire under Trump's plan to end the Gaza war.

title: Kim Pegula net worth 2025: How the Buffalo Bills owner built her NFL fortune
content: From an abandoned child in South Korea to a sports mogul, Kim Pegula's journey is remarkable. Alongside her husband Terry, she co-owns a $8 billion empire, including the Buffalo Bills and Sabres. Despite a serious health scare in 2022, Kim remains a powerful force in American sports, embodying resilience and leadership.

title: Steph Curry's wife Ayesha makes huge revelation about marriage
content: Ayesha Curry, wife of NBA star Steph Curry, revealed her personal journey. Initially focused on her career, she shifted her priorities to family after marriage and motherhood. Later, she rediscovered her own goals and built a successful career in culinary arts and business. She also co-runs a foundation with Steph Curry.

title: Lauren Kyle shares heartfelt message after Connor McDavid’s $25M deal
content: Connor McDavid's wife, Lauren Kyle, celebrated his new contract with the Edmonton Oilers. Her reaction mirrored fan relief and pride. The deal offers the team financial flexibility. Kyle's ventures, including Bar Trove, show her commitment to Edmonton. Their life and legacy are growing in the city, strengthening their bond with the community.

title: Fit & Ready! Rohit makes first public appearance after losing captaincy
content: Rohit Sharma, recently relieved of ODI captaincy, made a striking public appearance at the CEAT Cricket Rating Awards.  Looking significantly fitter and more determined, the veteran opener conveyed a strong message of readiness for international duty.  He expressed his eagerness for the upcoming ODI series against Australia, highlighting the challenging yet enjoyable nature of playing Down Under.

title: Jaipur-Ajmer highway inferno: LPG truck collision triggers massive fire
content: A truck carrying LPG cylinders collided with another vehicle on the Jaipur-Ajmer highway near Dudu, triggering multiple explosions and a major fire. Police and fire brigades responded, halting traffic and commencing rescue operations. The fire has since been brought under control with no reported casualties.

title: Bihar assembly elections: NDA, INDIA bloc race to complete poll pacts
content: Bihar's INDIA bloc faces seat-sharing hurdles as CPI(ML) rejects RJD's offer of 19 seats, demanding 30. Meanwhile, the NDA is also ironing out details with allies, including Chirag Paswan's LJP (Ram Vilas), ahead of the assembly polls.

title: Social media takedown notices should be sent “cautiously” and prudently: IT Secy
content: IT Secretary S. Krishnan said that social media takedowns under Sections 69A and 79(3)(b) of the IT Act, 2000 need to be sent with prudence, and must withstand court scrutiny

title: Rain gauges to be set up in all local bodies in Ernakulam soon
content: The project will be implemented on a pilot basis at Ayyampuzha, Kuttampuzha, Elanji, Njarakkal, Ramamangalam, Malayattoor, Chengamanad, Rayamangalam, and Kallorkkad

title: Maharashtra government announces ₹31,628 crore relief package for flood-affected farmers
content: Under this, farmers with dry land will receive ₹18,500 per hectare for crop damage, while those with hangami bagayati (seasonal irrigated land) will get ₹27,000 per hectare, and those with bagayatu (fully irrigated land) will receive compensation of ₹32,500 per hectare

title: Bombay HC seeks response from Maharashtra govt over faulty e-rickshaws given to disabled beneficiaries
content: The vehicles were manufactured by a Haryana-based company, resulting in delayed servicing and unavailability of spare parts, the petitioners claimed

title: Watch: Why did a Kerala school mime about Palestine spark controversy?
content: A school arts festival in Kasaragod, Kerala, turned controversial after teachers stopped a mime performance supporting Palestine, saying it was political. The move triggered protests, an inquiry, and public debate on artistic freedom and politics in education.

title: Sir Creek: Timeline of the India-Pakistan dispute over a 96-km long estuary
content: Pakistan’s continued militarisation along Sir Creek - an estuary in the Rann of Kutch, has raised red flags in India

title: Bombay High Court dismisses Anil Ambani’s petition against SBI’s fraud classification of Reliance Communications
content: The bank argued that natural justice requires only an opportunity to make a written representation, which Mr. Ambani was given but failed to utilise.

title: MRO inspects ethanol plant at Arugolanu after farmers flag pollution risks
content: Visit follows Chief Minister’s Office directive; villagers and HRF activists allege the plant’s proximity to canal and farms violates zoning norms and endangers irrigation sources

title: NIA files chargesheet against eight more accused in LeT-linked narco-terror case
content: The case is related to smuggling of 500 kg of heroin from Pakistan into Gujarat via a sea route, and its further transportation to Punjab

title: India’s response to U.S. has been uncompromising: Sanjeev Sanyal
content: Sanjeev Sanyal, member of the Prime Minister’s Economic Advisory Council, said global powers will not create “space” for India as it grows in power and influence

title: Mamata meets injured BJP MP Murmu but controversy over the attack rages on
content: Despite the attempt to reach out by the Chief Minister, the BJP leadership said that the not a single person was arrested in connection with the attack on MP.

title: Govt will rebuild all bridges, houses in flood affected north Bengal: CM Mamata Banerjee
content: The West Bengal CM directed community kitchens to remain operational till people return to their houses and assured that once the waters recede, a thorough survey will be conducted to assess the extent of the damage

title: Around 1,500 CRPF troops deployed in Ladakh, says official
content: The official said around 400 paramilitary personnel were sent a month before the September 24 violence and denied allegations that CRPF had fired pellet guns to control the violent protests

title: India edges closer to recognising Taliban as Muttaqi to arrive in Delhi for a five-day visit
content: India, China, Pakistan attend 10-nation Moscow Format talks that inducts Mr. Muttaqi as an “official” member for the first time, flies Taliban flag; joint statement indirectly slams U.S. bid to reclaim Bagram Air Base

title: Lok Sabha Speaker has sought urgent report on attack on BJP MP, MLA attack in north Bengal: Rijiju
content: No one can accept people taking the law into their own hands, says the Union Minister, referring to the attack on BJP leaders visiting flood-hit areas in West Bengal

title: Fuel outlets seek supply of non-ethanol blended petrol during monsoon
content: The dealers have been stocking up on pumps, ensuring availability of manpower during wet weather, and clearing canopies of leaves and dust to ensure there is proper rainwater drainage

title: Malappuram elders’ grand tour creates memories, breaks records
content: The mega excursion, organised by Malappuram municipality, claims the title of the largest elderly outing ever undertaken in the world

title: Cough syrup death toll rises to 20 in Madhya Pradesh
content: Five children, who consumed adulterated Coldrif, are under treatment for kidney failure; doctors begin indefinite strike in protest against arrest of paediatrician who prescribed the syrup; they seek action against drug manufacturer and those who approved its use

title: Supreme Court issues notice on plea to remove Assam BJP’s video ‘vilifying’ Muslims
content: The video post from BJP Assam unit’s X handle shows Muslims ‘taking over’ the State in the scenario that BJP is not elected to power in the upcoming Assembly elections

title: AIDSO condemns State govt. decision to extend school holidays for survey
content: ‘The step taken is undemocratic and it will become a hurdle in ensuring quality education in government and aided schools’

title: Cash transfer token gesture, doesn’t address real issues: CPI(ML)-L leader Dipankar Bhattacharya
content: CPI(ML)-Liberation, a constituent of the grand alliance in Bihar, says the Nitish Kumar government paid no heed to the people’s voices while acquiring land for a power plant in Pirpainti; the party’s general secretary Dipankar Bhattacharya says the BJP’s communal politics is “calculated” and the saffron party is penetrating Bihar in a “dangerous way”; he says the Opposition needs to organise a better campaign, but time is “running out”

title: Daughter of street hawker bags 11 gold medals in MA Kannada from Bangalore University
content: Of the seven gold medallists in Post Graduate programmes, six were girls. Even at the undergraduate level, three among the four toppers were girls.

title: At least 15 dead as landslip crushes bus in Himachal Pradesh
content: CM Sukhu orders expedited rescue and medical care; PM Modi announces ex-gratia relief; casualties could rise as rescue operations were still under way, officials said

title: Rajya Sabha Chairman C.P. Radhakrishnan meets floor leaders, seeks cooperation
content: Opposition members spoke of the deterioration of relations with Treasury, pressed for more time for the Opposition on the floor of the House

title: ‘No State has fully complied with key drug quality norms’
content: Corrective and Preventive Action (CAPA) guidelines form a critical part of Centre’s revised pharmaceutical manufacturing regulations

title: UFC 320 fight grades: A really good main card saves a mediocre slate
content: pereira's first-round knockout over Magomed Ankalaev was a tale of two fight cards . the main card featured a sure-to-be banger between Khalil Rountree Jr. and Ji Procházka .

title: What's up with Arch Manning? Coaches who have faced him and worked with him weigh in
content: a third-year player has been taunted and clapped back . the quarterback has been booed by road and home fans alike . he has also brought snippets of joy to those wearing Burnt Orange .

title: WWE Crown Jewel: Key stats and info to know before Saturday's premium live event
content: the premium live event (PLE) will be headlined by a pair of matches for the men's and women's crown jewel championships . undisputed WWE champion Cody Rhodes will challenge world heavyweight champion seth Rollins in one match .

title: Sorting out the bowl picture after another weekend of surprises
content: two preseason college football playoff contenders lost to opponents who had disappointed . last season's inaugural 12-team CFP, the five highest-ranked conference champions will make the field . the other eight teams will meet in first-round games at the campus sites of seeds Nos. 5 through 8 .

title: Is it better to have an early or late bye week? The answer may surprise you
content: the Packers or the Lions are the team to beat in the NFC North through four weeks of the season . the team was reeling, losers of three straight, and Mike Macdonald scheduled a meeting with all three of his coordinators and assistant head coach Leslie Frazier . source: "you can reset your team [during the bye] if you do it the right way"

title: 'Dump 61 Here': Raleigh meets fan who caught his home run ball
content: a fan wearing a "Big Dumper" shirt collects Cal Raleigh's homer in the ninth inning . the fan wears a shirt that reads "Dump 61 Here," the number referring to the Mariners' combined home run total for the regular season .

title: WWE 'Raw' takeaways: Everyone suddenly wants to be World Heavyweight Champion
